name: Turkey Punch
description:
Turkey Punch

Once Halloween is over, the Christmas decorations come out. Turkey is tired of having Thanksgiving overshadowed. It's time to take matters into his own feathers to see which holiday is truly better.

This fighting game was created by a 7 person team for Turkey Jam 2015, a game jam hosted by Cal Poly's Game Development Club (CPGD). The theme was "holiday".

How to Play

This is a 2-player game. Move around the playing field with the left and right keys for your respective player. Attack the other player by "punching" them, and defend from a punch using the block key.

Your character has a special bar at the top of the screen that fills up each time you get hit. When it's full, you can release your special!

Controls

Santa:

  • a - Left
  • d - Right
  • w - Punch
  • s - Block
  • e - Special: "The Slay"

Turkey:

  • a - Left
  • d - Right
  • w - Punch
  • s - Block
  • e - Special: "Gobblaser"
Credits
  • Casey - Santa Art, GUI Art
  • Cole - GUI and Sound Programmer
  • Ethan - Lead Programmer
  • eyfey - Several Songs (see below)
  • goofanader - Turkey Art, Ice Background Art
  • Louise - Menu Programmer and Designer
  • Sam - Character Programmer

  • Kevin MacLeod - "We Wish You a Merry Christmas"
